column4: hi! i'm just trying to install ubuntu for a friend on a dell desktop. am having problems though - managed to boot from the disc, the pre-login orange/brown screen has come up, but nothing has developed since! have been waiting for ages...
does anyone know why it could not be working? the cd is from the linux format magazine, so it should be good...
to be sure, when booting the ubuntu part of the CD, run "check CD for defects"
grr indeed. Check the Cd for scratches, and try cleaning it...that's all I can do if that's the case
